title: POSTTYPOGRAPHY.COM
content:
Here's a site belonging to Bruce Willen, a recent grad of the Maryland Institute College of Art.   
   
here's the front door   
   
 [http://www.posttypography.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018131959/http:/www.posttypography.com/)   
   
you have to click on the 'N' to get in.   
   
if you are unable to navigate past the typography 'essay' and the dingbats (D.Carson), here's a side entrance.   
   
 [http://www.posttypography.com/bruce/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018131959/http:/www.posttypography.com/bruce/)   
   
if you click on résumé you will be annoyed by pop-ups, but you will see a House Industries typographer as a reference.   
   
There's a typeface in development called Composite.   
   
The site is different. And a place to learn that Pink is the new Orange.   
   
bj
